comment.author: 90792679@N07
comment._content: I am a member of the Harrison Ohio Historical Society, this is a beautiful shot of the old bridge lost in the 1913 flood of the Whitewater River. It looks like a glass negative image. Would it be possible for me to get a high resolution copy of the picture for Harrison/? Thanks Terry Viel email is tev1224@cinci.rr.com

comment.author: 31033598@N03
comment._content:
Terry,

I'll contact our Special Collections librarian and get back to you.  Thanks so much for your interest.

Jason
